name: copyq-clipboard-manager
title: CopyQ Clipboard Manager
description: Lists CopyQ clipboard entries and allows user to paste them.
author: andrewcincotta

commands.name: view-clipboard-entries
commands.title: View Default CopyQ Tab
commands.description: Lists CopyQ clipboard entries and allows user to select/paste them.

preferences.name: max_items
preferences.title: Max Tabs
preferences.description: Max number of CopyQ tabs to display. Set to 0 for no limit. Setting the limit too high will result in a long load time.

commands.name: select-tab
commands.title: CopyQ
commands.description: Lists CopyQ tabs and allows the user to select one.
